transcript: this particular type of bag despite not being made for working out still absolutely made the most sense 99 of businesses just look at what other businesses are doing and copy them rather than just breaking all the way down and being like what actually has to happen I need to have something that carries all of the stuff that I'm likely to use I don't want it to take a lot of space I need to have easy access to everything so I don't have to dig around in the dark trying to feel around where my stuff is what I did sacrifice with that one is that it's not a back strap like that would have been a nice addition but I'm willing to sacrifice the fact that it didn't have a back shot for all the other benefits
